title: AE60007: Flight Mechanics - Quick Facts

Course name | FLIGHT MECHANICS

L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution

Semester | {{{semester}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: NonePerformance characteristics of aircraft, steady level flight, take off, landing and climbing flight, coordinated turning, concept and definition of stability; static stability in longitudinal, directional and lateral flights; dynamic stability, stability derivatives, characteristics equation, typical modes of longitudinal and directional motions; stability criterion and stability diagrams, Analysis of unsteady flight, concepts of trajectory optimization, automatic control and guidance.
